Name: Ayoub Episode 1
About the game: Hi I am Rainn...Game writer and developer Thanks for being here, please note that you don't need to read Episode 0 before this one as this episode can be considered a separate chapter but I recommend reading it first as it will help you better understand the concept behind the cards and will help you get to know the characters. Summary: After Ammar's incident, Ayoub starts a new chapter with the rest of the boys, another character comes to the picture wearing a mask and calling himself Ghaith. The boys in the elite class always find themselves up against Ghaith who appears in the most mysterious ways. Features: Exciting and fast-paced story Cool new graphics We have redrawn all the characters with many costumes and expressions More than 40 backgrounds Many CGs expressive music steam achievements
